articles.title: MindsEye boss claims game's negative reaction ahead of release has been paid for in "concerted effort" against studio - Eurogamer
articles.description: The co-CEO of MindsEye developer Build a Rocket Boy has claimed there are those who are being paid to talk negatively about the game.

articles.title: Xbox Showcase 2025 preview: What I expect to see from Microsoft's big annual games blowout - Windows Central
articles.description: It's that time again. The Xbox Showcase is upon us, set for sail on June 8th. What can we expect to see? I have some ideas — without hard spoilers.

articles.title: What I learned from a Bambu Labs A1 3D printer, part 2: Upgrades and mistakes - Ars Technica
articles.description: 3D-printing new parts for the A1 taught me a lot about plastic, and other things.

articles.title: Samsung’s One UI 8 beta arrives on Galaxy S25 phones - The Verge
articles.description: Samsung has launched the beta for One UI 8, its version of Android 16, in the UK, US, Germany, and South Korea.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch Online N64 games are getting Rewind — but only on Switch 2 - The Verge
articles.description: Rewind and a CRT filter are coming to N64 games on Switch 2, but won’t be supported on the original Switch, which is only getting customizable controls.

articles.title: Opera’s new browser can code websites and games for you - TechCrunch
articles.description: Opera's new browser, called Opera Neon, will focus on AI workflows and performing tasks for you, like shopping, coding and generating reports.
